name: Bomball (sei556)
description:
The year is 2019. It's one week after the great Cult of Jabrils Summer jam. You plan a discord session with the infamous dev sei556 to finally try his jam-winning game.

Bomball is a puzzle game that wants you to think differently than you'd expect.

Can you reach the end?

Please, for your own good, lower the volume before starting the game (or do it via windows sound mixer) - there are no options in the game.
